nodes.bodyText:
@tandraschko are you referring to this line? If so, src could be null originally:

  
    
      primefaces/src/main/java/org/primefaces/util/DynamicContentSrcBuilder.java
    
    
         Line 127
      in
      d05387b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           src = ResourceUtils.appendCacheBuster(src, cache); 
        
    
  


Shall I change that into throwing a FacesException?
I usually put these in alphabatical order to make them easier to find.
